article_title: Walgreens Shifts More Retail Clinic Ownership To Hospital Partners

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance will shift ownership and management of more than 50 retail clinics in its stores to Chicago’s largest hospital system, escalating a strategy to coordinate healthcare by handing off operations to local providers of medical care. Advocate Health Care, which operates a dozen hospitals and more than 250 sites [...]
